meta.description: Welcome to Artà in Mallorca, welcome to Casa Es Sindicat. Discover our lovingly restored town palace.

home.intro: Welcome to Artà in Mallorca, welcome to Casa Es Sindicat. Discover our lovingly restored town palace. Relax on four floors - by the pool, on the porche or the roof terrace. Explore the cultural diversity of Artà, the idyllic nature and the fantastic beaches in the vicinity. Simply look forward to an unforgettable experience in Mallorca.

location.title: Location
location.teaser: Quietly located and yet right in the middle of it all: from Casa Es Sindicat you can relax and explore everything that the town of Artà has to offer. And that is quite a lot.

house.title: House
house.teaser: Historic city palace, restored with much love: We can't give you a tour of the spacious house here - but we can whet your appetite.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.teaser: From the fully equipped kitchen to the heated pool and sports equipment, our casa has everything you want for an unforgettable vacation.

location.intro: Casa Es Sindicat is located in the northeast of the island, in the historic center of the picturesque town of Artà. From the small alley you can walk to the many sights in all directions.

castle.title: The castle
castle.content: Artà is rich in history, art and culture. One of the absolute highlights is the castle complex on Calvary with the Santuari de Sant Salvador pilgrimage church. It is majestically enthroned on a hill and offers a breathtaking view over the town and the surrounding countryside.

marketplace.title: The market place
marketplace.content: The traffic-calmed shopping street and the beautiful marketplace are also worth a visit. Here you can buy local products like olive oil, ham or cheese and enjoy the colorful market hustle and bustle. For daily shopping there are several supermarkets, which are also within walking distance.

streets.title: The alleys
streets.content: Stroll through the characteristic narrow streets and discover the typical Mallorcan architecture, the numerous studios and galleries. Here you will also find many cafes and restaurants where you can enjoy the local cuisine.

church.title: The Parish Church
church.content: The Transfiguracio del Senyor parish church is also an impressive structure and one of the city's most important religious landmarks. Particularly noteworthy is the combination of different architectural styles that have been added over the centuries.

house.intro: The historic town house Casa Es Sindicat was renovated by us with great attention to detail and preserving the architecturally valuable elements. It extends over four floors and about 600 square meters. At the back there is a large terrace with a spacious heated pool. A small fountain, sun loungers and chairs and a dining table for 8 people invite you to relax and enjoy here.

groundFloor.title: Ground floor
groundFloor.teaser: Plenty of space for enjoyment: on the lowest floor awaits the fully equipped kitchen and spacious dining room with large dining table and the fireplace for cozy hours.

firstFloor.title: First floor
firstFloor.teaser: Those who want to retreat can make themselves comfortable on the sofa on the second floor. Here you can also find the master bedroom, a spacious bathroom, a dressing room and the library.

secondFloor.title: Second floor
secondFloor.teaser: One floor up you will find two separate apartments for two people each. Both have a bedroom with a double bed and a private bathroom. Enjoy the view to the front or to the back - the choice is yours.

studio.title: Studio
studio.teaser: Through the terrace you enter the studio. Here you can make yourself comfortable on one of the two designer chairs and take in the unique architecture and special atmosphere of the room.

porcheRooftop.title: Porche & Rooftop
porcheRooftop.teaser: High and even higher: between the first and second floor you will find the porche, where you can unwind from the day bed. At the very top of the roof terrace, a breathtaking panoramic view over Artà awaits you.

patioPool.title: Patio & Pool
patioPool.teaser: Behind the house, relaxation is the order of the day: refresh yourself in the 3 x 6 m and 1.60 m deep pool. Make yourself comfortable in the sun. And enjoy the view of the imposing cacti and the old medlar tree.

groundFloor.intro: Bienvenido in Casa Es Sindicat! As you enter the house, you enter the large entrance area. To the left is the guest bathroom, the utility room with washer and dryer and a storage room. To the right is the garage, where there is a second refrigerator with drinks.

dining.title: Room to enjoy
dining.content: A few steps further opens the dining room with the massive wooden table. Here you can make yourself comfortable with up to six people. You would like to visit us in winter? No problem, on cold days the fireplace will warm you.

kitchen.title: Everything for gourmets
kitchen.content: Just around the corner is the large kitchen. There is also seating at the long kitchen island made of typical Mallorcan sandstone. Also otherwise the kitchen leaves nothing to be desired - from induction stove to fully automatic coffee machine.

firstFloor.intro: On the first floor is the spacious living room with adjoining library. Here you can listen to music, watch TV, read or just relax: There is room for everyone on the large sofa and the inviting armchairs.

livingRoom.title: Pure relaxation
livingRoom.content: Of course, there is a smart TV with soundbar and reception of most German, Spanish and international channels. For additional coziness in winter, the stylish cast-iron stove.

bedRoom.title: Well-being guaranteed
bedRoom.content: Behind the living room adjoins the bedroom, which is equipped with a double bed with a width of 200 cm. En suite are the dressing room and the bathroom. The latter has a comfortable shower and a free-standing bathtub. Feeling good is guaranteed here.

secondFloor.intro: On the second floor there are two well-equipped apartments. Both have a spacious living room. Planning to work from the remote office? No problem, there is free Wi-Fi and desks you can use for your workation. Plus, the rooms have a day bed.

apartment1.title: Exceeds all expectations
apartment1.content: The larger of the two apartments is perfect for staying with a toddler up to 5 years old. For this purpose, a crib is available, which can be assembled and disassembled in no time. Make yourself at home.

apartment2.title: Dreamlike cozy
apartment2.content: How you make your bed, is how you sleep. That's why the bedrooms are equipped with fantastically comfortable queen-size beds. You don't need to worry about the bed linen, we will make the beds fresh for you. Also the bathrooms with spacious showers offer everything you need for a perfect vacation.

studio.intro: You enter the studio via the terrace. Here you can make yourself comfortable on one of the two designer chairs and take in the unique architecture and atmosphere of the space. But the studio offers much more.

downstairs.title: Lower area
downstairs.content: The studio extends over two floors. On the lower level, there is a private bathroom next to the main room. Perfect if you use the terrace and pool area during the day and want to change or shower after swimming.

gallery.title: On the gallery
gallery.content: A staircase leads up to the gallery. Here there is another seating area and a desk. Whether to relax or work from the remote office: Here you will find the perfect retreat.

porcheRooftop.intro: If you love the view, you'll be spoiled for choice at Casa Es Sindicat. Porche or roof terrace? Why not both? For example, during the day to read on the day bed and at sunset on the roof.

porche.title: A place to linger
porche.content: Between the first and second floors is the porche. In Spanish, this refers to a covered terrace. What makes our porche so special is the magnificent view of the courtyard and pool area. And, of course, the inviting day bed.

rooftop.title: The city from above
rooftop.content: An absolute highlight is the roof terrace on the third floor. Enjoy the breathtaking panoramic view over the rooftops of Artà, up to the castle and the cathedral to the sea in the distance.

patioPool.intro: If you look at the house from the street - who knows what oasis is hidden behind it? Step out of the kitchen or dining room and onto the patio - the heart of Casa Es Sindicat.

patio.title: Terrace & dining table
patio.content: Framed on three sides, the terrace with the large dining table opens first. The perfect place to enjoy the view of the garden or have dinner under the impressive Moroccan lamp.

pool.title: Pool & garden
pool.content1: Over a step you reach the pool area. Here you can refresh yourself in the 3 x 6 m and 1.60 m deep pool and test your fitness at the counter-current system.
pool.content2: Afterwards you can relax in the sun on one of the comfortable loungers. Or maybe one of the two chairs under the old medlar tree will become your new favorite place?

stage.headline: Booking
stage.subline: We are looking forward to you!

booking.intro: You want to book Casa Es Sindicat? In the occupancy schedule you can see if your desired date is still available. The already rented dates are marked in red. All other dates can be requested. If you have found a suitable period for your planned vacation, please send us a message via contact. We will answer you as soon as possible.

price.title: Prices
price.info: Prices for occupancy with up to 6 adults plus two small children (up to 5 years):

conditions.title: Rental conditions
conditions.list:
• We will confirm the booking of the Casa by e-mail. In order for the rental contract to come into effect, you must transfer 25% of the rent as a deposit within one week of receiving the confirmation.
  • The remaining 75% of the rent must be received on our account until 6 weeks before the beginning of the rental period.
  • A rental deposit of € 1,000 must be received in our account at least one week before the start of the rental period.
  • On arrival the keys will be handed over and an introduction to the Casa will be given by a person authorized by us.
  • On the day of departure the same person will take back the keys and check the Casa for its proper condition. If it is in perfect condition, the deposit will be returned immediately.
  • Bed linen and towels are included in the rent. For the final cleaning we charge a flat rate of 220 €.
  • The Casa may only be occupied by the number of persons indicated at the time of booking. Maximum 6 or 8 persons plus 2 small children up to 5 years.
  • The use of the pool is at your own risk. Children must be supervised by parents while using the pool.
  • On the day of arrival the casa can be occupied from 16:00. On the day of departure the casa must be vacated by 11:00 am.
  • Pets are not allowed.
  • Smoking in the house is not allowed.
  • The celebration of parties in the Casa is not allowed.

directions.title: Once across the island.
directions.content: Casa Es Sindicat is located in the small town of Àrta in the northeast of Mallorca. From Palma de Mallorca Airport, the fastest way to reach Àrta is via the Ma-15, which takes about an hour. Other connections by cab, bus or train are possible. You can get information about this, for example, here.

contact.title: Here's how you can reach us.
contact.content: If you have any questions about the house, want to make a reservation or leave a review, just use the form on the right. We will contact you as soon as possible.

general.headline: General information
general.content: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. For detailed information on the subject of data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.

usage.headline: Data collection on our website
usage.content:
Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find his contact details in the imprint of this website.

How do we collect your data?
On the one hand, your data is collected by you providing it to us. This can be, for example, data that you enter in a contact form.

Other data is collected automatically by our IT systems when you visit the website. This is mainly technical data (e.g. Internet browser, operating system or time of page view). The collection of this data takes place automatically as soon as you enter our website.

What do we use your data for?
Part of the data is collected to ensure error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.

What rights do you have regarding your data?
You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time. You also have a right to demand the correction, blocking or deletion of this data. For this purpose, as well as for further questions on the subject of data protection, you can contact us at any time at the address given in the imprint. Furthermore, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.

You also have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. For details, please refer to the privacy policy under "Right to restriction of processing".

thirdParty.headline: Third-party analytics and tools
thirdParty.content:
When visiting our website, your surfing behavior can be statistically evaluated. This is done primarily with cookies and with so-called analysis programs. The analysis of your surfing behavior is usually anonymous; the surfing behavior cannot be traced back to you. You can object to this analysis or prevent it by not using certain tools. You can find detailed information on this in the following privacy policy.

You can object to this analysis. We will inform you about the objection options in this privacy policy.

privacy.headline: Privacy
privacy.content:
The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.

When you use this website, various personal data are collected. Personal data is data with which you can be personally identified. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and what we use it for. It also explains how and for what purpose this is done.

We would like to point out that data transmission on the Internet (e.g. when communicating by e-mail) can have security gaps. Complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.

revocation.headline: Revocation of your consent to data processing
revocation.content: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You can revoke an already given consent at any time. rightOfObjection.headline: Right to object to data collection in special cases and to direct marketing (Art. 21 DSGVO)
rightOfObjection.content:
If the data processing is based on Art. 6 (1) lit. e or f DSGVO, you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data at any time for reasons arising from your particular situation; this also applies to profiling based on these provisions. The respective legal basis on which processing is based can be found in this privacy policy. If you object, we will no longer process your personal data concerned unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing which override your interests, rights and freedoms, or the processing serves the purpose of asserting, exercising or defending legal claims (objection pursuant to Art. 21(1) DSGVO).

If your personal data is processed for the purpose of direct marketing, you have the right to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you for the purpose of such marketing; this also applies to profiling, insofar as it is associated with such direct marketing. If you object, your personal data will subsequently no longer be used for the purpose of direct marketing (objection pursuant to Art. 21 (2) DSGVO).

rightOfAppeal.headline: Right of complaint to the competent supervisory authority
rightOfAppeal.content: In the event of breaches of the GDPR, data subjects shall have a right of appeal to a supervisory authority, in particular in the Member State of their habitual residence, their place of work or the place of the alleged breach. The right of appeal is without prejudice to other administrative or judicial remedies.

rightOfDataPortability.headline: Right to data portability
rightOfDataPortability.content: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format. If you request the direct transfer of the data to another controller, this will only be done insofar as it is technically feasible.

encryption.headline: SSL or TLS encryption
encryption.content:
This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as orders or requests that you send to us as the site operator. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from "http://" to "https://" and by the lock symbol in your browser line.

If SSL or TLS encryption is activated, the data you transmit to us cannot be read by third parties.

deletion.headline: Information, blocking, deletion and correction
deletion.content: Within the framework of the applicable legal provisions, you have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient and the purpose of data processing and, if necessary, a right to correction, blocking or deletion of this data. For this purpose, as well as for further questions on the subject of personal data, you can contact us at any time at the address given in the imprint.

restriction.headline: Right to restriction of processing
restriction.content:
You have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data. To do this, you can contact us at any time at the address given in the imprint. The right to restriction of processing exists in the following cases:

  • If you dispute the accuracy of your personal data stored by us, we usually need time to verify this. For the duration of the review, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
  • If the processing of your personal data has happened / is happening unlawfully, you can request the restriction of data processing instead of deletion.
  • If we no longer need your personal data, but you need it to exercise, defend or assert legal claims, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data instead of erasure.
  • If you have lodged an objection pursuant to Art. 21 (1) DSGVO, a balancing of your and our interests must be carried out. As long as it has not yet been determined whose interests prevail, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.


    • If you have restricted the processing of your personal data, this data may - apart from being stored - only be processed with your consent or for the assertion, exercise or defense of legal claims or for the protection of the rights of another natural or legal person or for reasons of an important public interest of the European Union or a Member State.

cookies.headline: Cookies
cookies.content:
The Internet pages partly use so-called cookies. Cookies do not cause any damage to your computer and do not contain viruses. Cookies serve to make our offer more user-friendly, effective and secure. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer and saved by your browser.

Most of the cookies we use are so-called "session cookies". They are automatically deleted after the end of your visit. Other cookies remain stored on your terminal device until you delete them. These cookies allow us to recognize your browser on your next visit.

You can set your browser so that you are informed about the setting of cookies and only allow cookies in individual cases, exclude the acceptance of cookies for certain cases or in general and activate the automatic deletion of cookies when closing the browser. If cookies are deactivated, the functionality of this website may be limited.

Cookies that are required to carry out the electronic communication process or to provide certain functions that you have requested (e.g. shopping cart function) are stored on the basis of Art. 6 (1) lit. f DSGVO. The website operator has a legitimate interest in storing cookies for the technically error-free and optimized provision of its services. Insofar as other cookies (e.g. cookies for analyzing your surfing behavior) are stored, these are treated separately in this privacy policy.

logFiles.headline: Server log files
logFiles.content:
The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are:

  • Browser type and version
  • Used operation system
  • Referrer URL
  • Host name of the accessing computer
  • Time of the server request
  • IP address

    • This data is not merged with other data sources.

    The collection of this data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f DSGVO. The website operator has a legitimate interest in the technically error-free presentation and optimization of its website - for this purpose, the server log files must be collected.

contact.headline: Contact form
contact.content:
If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your data from the inquiry form, including the contact data you provided there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We do not pass on this data without your consent.

The processing of the data entered in the contact form is therefore based exclusively on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a DSGVO). You can revoke this consent at any time. For this purpose, an informal communication by e-mail to us is sufficient. The legality of the data processing operations carried out until the revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.

The data you entered in the contact form will remain with us until you request us to delete it, revoke your consent to store it, or the purpose for storing the data no longer applies (e.g. after we have completed processing your request). Mandatory legal provisions - in particular retention periods - remain unaffected.

request.headline: Request by e-mail, phone or fax
request.content:
If you contact us by e-mail, telephone or fax, your inquiry including all resulting personal data (name, inquiry) will be stored and processed by us for the purpose of processing your request. We do not pass on this data without your consent.

The processing of this data is based on Art. 6 (1) lit. b DSGVO, if your request is related to the performance of a contract or is necessary for the implementation of pre-contractual measures. In all other cases, the processing is based on your consent (Art. 6 (1) (a) DSGVO) and / or on our legitimate interests (Art. 6 (1) (f) DSGVO), as we have a legitimate interest in the effective processing of requests sent to us.

The data you send to us via contact requests will remain with us until you request us to delete it, revoke your consent to store it, or the purpose for storing the data no longer applies (e.g. after we have completed processing your request). Mandatory legal provisions - in particular legal retention periods - remain unaffected.

processing.headline: Processing of data (customer and contract data)
processing.content:
We collect, process and use personal data only to the extent that they are necessary for the establishment, content or modification of the legal relationship (inventory data). This is done on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b DSGVO, which permits the processing of data for the fulfillment of a contract or pre-contractual measures. We collect, process and use personal data about the use of our Internet pages (usage data) only insofar as this is necessary to enable the user to use the service or to bill the user.

The collected customer data will be deleted after completion of the order or termination of the business relationship. Statutory retention periods remain unaffected.

googleFonts.content:

For this purpose, the browser you are using must connect to Google's servers. This gives Google knowledge that our website has been accessed via your IP address. Google Web Fonts are used in the interest of a uniform and appealing presentation of our online offers. This represents a legitimate interest within the meaning of Art. 6 (1) lit. f DSGVO.
If your browser does not support web fonts, a standard font will be used by your computer.
